TextView.android:text: Issuance/ Re Issuance of Identification Card and Purchase Booklet for Senior Citizen

Republic Act 9994 grants additional benefits to senior citizens. Hence, they shall be entitled to at least 20% discount for purchase of medicines and other essential medical supplies. medical and dental services, admission fees charged by theaters, utilization of all services in hotels, public and transportation, air and sea transport.
Filipino Citizen, Resident of Kitaotao, Bukidnon, 60 years old and above.
2. Birth Certificate/ Marriage Contract/ GSIS ID/SSS ID/ PASSPORT (NOT EXPIRED)/or Any Valid ID- Photocopy
2. Local Civil Registrar/ Philippine Statistic Authority, Client
ISSUANCE OF SENIOR CITIZENS CARD (NEW APPLICANT/RENEWAL AND REISSUANCE for LOST ID)
1. Client apply/request for Senior Citizens Identification Card for New applicant/renewal & re-issuance of lost ID
₱50.00 - New applicant/ None Renewal \n\n₱50.00 - reissuance for lost Senior Citizens ID
2. Participate in the interview and present documentary requirements
2.2. Fills up Senior Citizens Registration Form.
2.4. Facilities approval of ID to mayor for signature
3. Client receives the requested Senior Citizens ID card
3.1. Releases Senior Citizens Identification card or Purchase Booklet
ISSUANCE OF SENIOR CITIZENS PURCHASE BOOKLET
1. Client apply/ request for senior purchase booklet (medicine/ basic commodities)
2. Client receives the requested Purchase booklet
2.1. Releasing of Senior Citizen Purchase Booklet
3. Accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) Form and drop in the CSS drop box
3.1. Request the client to accomplish the Client Satisfaction Service (CSS) form
